summary: A couple of master thieves find themselves trapped within a house they intended to rob, only to discover they've inadvertently wandered into the lair of a deranged serial killer.
cast: Walter Michael Bost|Tim Chiou|Chris Dinh|Michelle Grondine|Lincoln Hoppe|Nathan Moore|Katrina Nelson|Justin Ray|Lauren Reeder|Chris Riedell|Katie Savoy|Devyn Stokdyk|Leonard Wu|Jerry Ying
keywords: couple relationship|kidnapping|heist gone wrong|brother sister relationship|title at the end
title: Crush the Skull
